name: Teryaki Onion
description: Indulge in a deliciously Healthyfied Teryaki Onion recipe that aligns perfectly with a low-carb and low-sugar diet. This dish captures the essence of health-conscious cooking without compromising on taste, making it a staple for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the white onion into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, saut√© the diced onion until they become translucent, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 tbsp of Teryaki Sauce to the pan and stir well, ensuring the onions are evenly coated. Cook for another 2 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly and the onions absorb the flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
